key_risks: Commodity price volatility due to reliance on steel, aluminum, and other metals
Supply chain disruptions impacting production and delivery timelines
Environmental and regulatory risks from manufacturing processes and reliance on metals
Legal disputes, including patent and labor violation cases
Workplace safety concerns and OSHA violations
controversies: Patent disputes, e.g., Valmont Industries, Inc. v. Lindsay Corporation
Labor violations, e.g., Valmont Industries, Inc. v. N.L.R.B
OSHA investigations and safety violations at Valmont Coatings
environmental_issues: Environmental scrutiny of manufacturing processes and reliance on metals
Potential impact of regulatory changes on operations
social_issues: Workplace safety concerns following a worker's death
Labor violations and associated reputational risks
governance_issues: Legal disputes and associated financial and reputational risks
Regulatory compliance challenges, particularly in environmental policies

sources.title: Green manufacturing: the impact of industrial robots on export emissions
